bio: He wanders the world without a goal. It's an absolute miracle if the three brothers Illoo, Elloo, and Alloo all meet up.

soultimate.name: Wandering World
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops foe's Attack by 30% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: Attack to decrease foes' attack power for a time.

skill.effect: Spd ↑ when attacked, 1.6% ↑ per hit, lasts till death.
skill.name: Hit and Run

name: Alloo
